mapper.select: select count(1) from t_user where delete_flag='否'

select tu.id,tu.userName,tu.`password`,tu.`name`,tr.id as roleId,tr.`name` as roleName,tu.entryDate,tu.leaveDate,tu.email,tu.loginDate,tu.state from t_user tu LEFT JOIN t_user_role tur on tu.id=tur.userId LEFT JOIN t_role tr on tur.roleId=tr.id where tu.delete_flag='否' GROUP BY id order by id desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
